nodes.text: The Corrobor was a virtual reality attraction that bounty hunter Aurra Sing considered clever and was present at a funfair on the Galactic Empire's capital of Coruscant in 19 BBY. The Corrobor used a neuralstim booth in order to give the user the sensation of becoming a starship with all of its component parts.
The Corrobor was mentioned in Coruscant Nights II: Street of Shadows, a 2008 novel written by Michael Reaves.
